help.text: Uses QIIME's assign_taxonomy.py to classify with RDP

input.name: consensus
input.text: Minimum fraction of database hits that must have a specific taxonomic assignment to assign that taxonomy to a query

input.name: similarity
input.text: Minimum percent similarity to consider a database match a hit

input.name: maxdb
input.text: Number of database hits to consider when making an assignment

input.name: training_seqs
input.text: Full filepath to the training set sequence file (Optional, will use QIIME default if not given)

input.name: training_tax
input.text: Full filepath to the training set taxonomy file (Optional, will use QIIME default if not given)
